content.p: Associate Professor of Business Economics;Divisional Director of Business Economics & Quantitative Methods., Faculty of Social Sciences Dr. Lee's teaching interests are in the area of Managerial, Organizational and Personnel Economics. He currently teaches Economics of Organisation and Contemporary Economic Policy at undergraduate… read more Dr. Lee's research interest lies in the field of efficiency and productivity analysis.
